body:
# About me

* My affiliation: European Synchrotron Radiation Facility ([ESRF](http://www.esrf.eu)), 6 rue Jules Horowitz, BP 220, F38043 Grenoble (France) 
* You can find my scientific activity at ORCID, my ID is [0000-0003-2539-6198](http://orcid.org/000-0003-2539-6198)
* Fulltext access to my papers on [arXiv](http://arxiv.org/find/cond-mat/1/au:+Rovezzi_M/0/1/0/all/0/1)
* My PhD thesis on TEL: [Study of the local order around magnetic impurities in semiconductors for spintronics](http://tel.archives-ouvertes.fr/tel-00442852/en/) (University of Grenoble "Joseph Fourier", 2009)
* Master degree dissertation: [Mo/Si multilayers characterized by standing-wave assisted XAFS](http://www.rovezzi.it/mauro/thesis/) (University of Rome "Tor Vergata", 2005 - NOTE: it is in Italian!)
* I like Python and GitHub: [maurov](https://github.com/maurov)
* I use Twitter only for scientific and related posts: [@scimaus](https://twitter.com/scimaus)
* My preferred RSS reader is Feedly
* I use Mendeley but I do not like its social part because I do not want to pollute my references database
* I have a ResearchGate account but I do not know why!
* I do not have Facebook, LinkedIn and Google+ accounts
* What else?! ... [my email](http://mailhide.recaptcha.net/d?k=011RL8OK49d7vJvXkwD_8ALg==&c=hTFYpQoLVA_88AeskxfgaTP4jlBUi80yhECrU3XtyfI=)
